name: Your Business Name
description: Brief description of your business and services. This will be shown to visitors when they interact with your AI assistant.
industry: Your Industry (e.g., Restaurant, Retail, Professional Services, Healthcare, etc.)

content.title: Company Homepage
content.description: Live overview of our homepage with key information and services

content.title: About Our Company
content.description: Live extracted content from our company information page

content.title: Our Services
content.description: Overview of all services and offerings we provide

content.title: Contact Us
content.description: Get in touch with our team for inquiries and support

content.title: Schedule a Meeting
content.description: Book a meeting with our team to discuss your needs

knowledgeBase.question: What services do you offer?
knowledgeBase.answer: We provide [describe your main services/products here]. Our team specializes in [your specialties] and we serve clients in [your target market/location].

knowledgeBase.question: How can I contact you?
knowledgeBase.answer: You can reach us through multiple channels: phone at [your phone], email at [your email], or fill out our contact form. We typically respond within [response time].

knowledgeBase.question: What are your business hours?
knowledgeBase.answer: We're open [your business hours]. For urgent matters outside business hours, please [emergency contact method].

knowledgeBase.question: Where are you located?
knowledgeBase.answer: We're located at [your address]. We serve [your service area/regions] and also offer [remote services if applicable].

knowledgeBase.question: What makes you different?
knowledgeBase.answer: [Describe your unique value proposition, what sets you apart from competitors, your experience, certifications, etc.]

knowledgeBase.question: How much do your services cost?
knowledgeBase.answer: Our pricing varies based on [factors that affect pricing]. For a detailed quote tailored to your needs, please contact us or schedule a consultation.

knowledgeBase.question: Do you offer consultations?
knowledgeBase.answer: Yes! We offer [free/paid] consultations to understand your needs and discuss how we can help. You can schedule a meeting through our booking system.

knowledgeBase.question: Can you show me more information?
knowledgeBase.answer: I'd be happy to show you more about our services and company information. Let me pull up our overview for you.

knowledgeBase.question: How long have you been in business?
knowledgeBase.answer: [Your company history - when established, years of experience, major milestones, etc.]

knowledgeBase.question: Do you have references or testimonials?
knowledgeBase.answer: Yes, we have [testimonials/case studies/references]. You can [where to find them - website section, request them, etc.]

settings.welcomeMessage: Hello! I'm your AI assistant. I can help you learn about our services, answer questions, and connect you with our team. How can I help you today?
settings.aiPersonality: friendly and professional, knowledgeable about the business
